description: BuildVolumeMount describes the mounting of a Volume within buildah's runtime environment.

destinationPath.description: destinationPath is the path within the buildah runtime environment at which the volume should be mounted. The transient mount within the build image and the backing volume will both be mounted read only. Must be an absolute path, must not contain '..' or ':', and must not collide with a destination path generated by the builder process Paths that collide with those added by the build controller will result in a failed build with an error message detailing which path caused the error.
